full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title and Reference

* Title (English): W6895-220084 - General Construction Services Standing Offer, 4 Wing, Cold Lake, AB
* Title (French): W6895-220084 - Offre à commandes (OC) portant sur des services de construction générale, à la 4e Escadre, Base des Forces canadiennes (BFC) Cold Lake (Alberta)
* Reference Number: WS3512103630
* Solicitation Number: WS3512103630

## Tender Details

* Publication Date: October 19, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 15, 2022, 2:00 PM MST
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSCG/SPAV)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Hector Ho (SPAV/ PSCG)
	+ Email: [hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not Available
	+ Fax: Not Available
* Tender Description:
General construction services are required to provide skilled labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials to support construction projects at 4 Wing Cold Lake and Primrose Lake Evaluation Range (PELR) in response to call-ups from the Department of National Defence (DND).
Services will be performed on an as- required basis. It is anticipated that up to three (3) firms will be issued a standing offer contract for a term of three years with one option year.

## Important Amendments

* Closing time amendment: Ignore the initial Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM MTS on the tender closing date. Bids submitted after 2:00 PM MST will be considered non- responsive.

## Compliance Requirements

* This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The selected bidder will be required to meet the technical requirements outlined in the Statement of Work.
* Vendors must complete a self-declaration of conformity with the regulations outlined in the Canada Revenue Agency's "2017 Goods and Services Tax (GST) / Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) Regime."

Note:
